comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: HRH Hildegarde Maria Christina Therese Princess of Bavaria born Munich, March 5th, 1881 died Wildenwart Castle, February 2nd, 1948 8th of 13 children of Ludwig III of Bavaria and Maria Theresa, the only daughter of the late Archduke Ferdinand Karl Viktor of Austria-Este photos of the daughters seem to be a bit of a collectors item, Hilde isn't the most popular but she can seen with other photos of her sisters on this link forum.alexanderpalace.org/index.php?topic=5534.0 and her mother is earlier in this set [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4586277641/?addedcomment=1#comment72157623938552979]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Bain appears to have cropped Hildegarde from a larger group photo. The gent at the right missed out: we see only his nose and pince-nez.
